id: Saudi Royals Rally to Protect the Family
paragraph:
November 17, 2018 Saudi Arabia’s royal family is closing ranks to protect the monarchy from a storm of criticism after the killing of dissident journalistJamal Khashoggi in the kingdom’s Istanbul consulate.For now, Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman’s position as heir to the throne appears secure, royals and people close to the ruling family say.But as international...
